document.full_text: wal-mart stores inc  is making progress bringing items and shoppers back to its u.s. stores, and turning around u.s. sales remains its top priority, president and chief executive mike duke said on tuesday.
document.title: wal-mart ceo seeing progress in the u.s. business
lines_and_colors: wal-mart stores inc  is making progress bringing items and shoppers back to its u.s. stores, and turning around u.s. sales remains its top priority, president and chief executive mike duke said on tuesday.
